mapper.select: SELECT ct_ko_nm , ct_idx FROM ad_category WHERE ct_parent = 1 and ct_idx != 1 GROUP BY ct_ko_nm

SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT DISTINCT st.str_idx , IFNULL(st.str_like_cnt, 0) AS str_like_cnt , st.str_lat , st.str_lng , IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image), st.str_image) AS str_image , st.str_category , IFNULL(st.str_website, '') AS str_website , asd.str_dt_name , asd.str_dt_type , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_address , '') AS str_dt_address , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_address_dt , '') AS str_dt_address_dt , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc , '') AS str_dt_desc , IFNULL(st.operating_hour , '') AS operating_hour , st.str_like_cnt , TRUNCATE(AVG(rv.review_avg), 1)AS review_ave , TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)) )), 1 ) AS str_km FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON st.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_review rv ON st.str_idx = rv.str_idx WHERE asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} AND st.str_idx = #{str_idx} GROUP BY st.str_idx, asd.str_dt_type ORDER BY IFNULL(#{sorting},'')

SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT parking_mng_code , parking_name , parking_category , parking_type , parking_address , parking_lat , parking_lng , parking_hour , CONCAT('평일 : ', week_start_time, '~', week_end_time) AS week_time , week_start_time , week_end_time , CONCAT('토요일 : ', satur_start_time, '~', satur_end_time) AS satur_time , satur_start_time , satur_end_time , CONCAT('공휴일 : ', holiday_start_time, '~', holiday_end_time) AS holiday_time , holiday_start_time , holiday_end_time , parking_base_time , parking_base_fee , TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(parking_lat)) * cos(radians(parking_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(parking_lat)) )), 1 ) AS parking_km ,CASE WHEN parking_base_fee = 0 THEN parking_free WHEN parking_base_fee != 0 THEN CONCAT(parking_free ,' ' ,parking_base_time,'분 ', parking_base_fee, '원 ') ELSE '현장' END AS parking_fee_info , parking_free , parking_free_check FROM ad_parking WHERE parking_mng_code = #{parking_mng_code}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ass.str_idx, ass.stp_idx, ass.stp_nm, st.str_lat, st.str_lng, IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image),'') AS str_image, ass.stp_contents, asd.str_dt_name, ass.stp_lang_type, IFNULL(CONCAT(#{iconUrl}, ass.stp_y_image),'') AS stp_y_image, IFNULL(CONCAT(#{iconUrl}, ass.stp_n_image),'') AS stp_n_image, IF(FIND_IN_SET(#{mb_idx}, GROUP_CONCAT(asl.mb_idx)) > 0, 1, 0) AS stp_count, ass.stp_give, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(IFNULL(#{mb_idx}, 0), GROUP_CONCAT(asl.mb_idx)) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS stamp_status FROM ad_stamp_set ass LEFT JOIN ad_store st ON ass.str_idx = st.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON ass.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_stamp_list asl ON ass.stp_idx = asl.stp_idx WHERE ass.stp_use = 'Y' AND ass.stp_lang_type = #{lang} AND asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} GROUP BY ass.stp_idx )AS stamp_list
WHERE stamp_list.stamp_status = #{stamp_status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_stamp_list WHERE mb_idx = #{mb_idx} AND stp_status = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_stamp_set WHERE stp_lang_type = #{lang}

SET @user_lng = IFNULL((SELECT user_lng FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 128.729853); SET @user_lat = IFNULL((SELECT user_lat FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = IFNULL(#{fcm_idx}, '')), 36.568195);
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ass.str_idx, ass.stp_idx, ass.stp_nm, st.str_lat, st.str_lng, ass.stp_contents, asd.str_dt_address, asd.str_dt_name, IFNULL(CONCAT(st.str_image),'') AS str_image, ass.stp_lang_type, ass.stp_give, IFNULL(CONCAT(#{iconUrl}, ass.stp_y_image),'') AS stp_y_image, IFNULL(CONCAT(#{iconUrl}, ass.stp_n_image),'') AS stp_n_image, TRUNCATE(IFNULL((SELECT AVG(review_avg) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = ass.str_idx), 0.0), 1)AS review_ave, COUNT(IFNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_review WHERE str_idx = ass.str_idx), 0)) AS review_count, TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(@user_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(@user_lng)) + sin(radians(@user_lat)) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)) )), 1 ) AS str_km, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(IFNULL(#{mb_idx}, 0), GROUP_CONCAT(asl.mb_idx)) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS stamp_status FROM ad_stamp_set ass LEFT JOIN ad_store st ON ass.str_idx = st.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON ass.str_idx = asd.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_stamp_list asl ON ass.stp_idx = asl.stp_idx WHERE ass.stp_use = 'Y' AND ass.stp_lang_type = #{lang} AND asd.str_dt_type = #{lang} AND ass.str_idx = #{str_idx} )AS stamp_list

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ass.stp_idx, 'stamp' AS type, st.str_idx, st.str_lat, st.str_lng, asd.str_dt_name, ass.stp_give, (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx}) AS mb_idx, #{fcm_idx} AS fcm_idx, CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(IFNULL((SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx}), 0), GROUP_CONCAT((SELECT mb_idx FROM ad_stamp_list WHERE mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx}) AND stp_idx = ass.stp_idx LIMIT 1))) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS stamp_status, TRUNCATE( (6371 * acos( cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(st.str_lat)) * cos(radians(st.str_lng) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(st.str_lat)) )), 1 ) AS str_km , asd.str_dt_name AS title , ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_stamp_list WHERE mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx}) AND stp_status = 'Y' AND stp_idx = ass.stp_idx)+1) AS content ,(SELECT fcm_token FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx}) AS token FROM ad_stamp_set ass LEFT JOIN ad_store st ON ass.str_idx = st.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON ass.str_idx = asd.str_idx WHERE ass.stp_use = 'Y' AND ass.stp_lang_type = #{lang} GROUP BY ass.stp_lang_type, ass.stp_idx HAVING str_km > 10 ) AS stamp_list ORDER BY stamp_list.str_km LIMIT 1

SELECT * FROM( SELECT pt.post_idx, DATE_FORMAT(pt.post_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS post_reg_date, pt.post_reg_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_like li WHERE li.post_idx = pt.post_idx AND li.like_type = 'P' AND like_status = 'Y') AS post_like_cnt, pt.post_title, SUBSTRING(pt.post_content, 1,100) AS post_content, am.mb_nickname, IFNULL((SELECT li.like_status FROM ad_like li WHERE li.mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) AND li.post_idx = pt.post_idx AND li.like_type = 'P'), 'N') AS like_status, IFNULL((SELECT mark_use FROM ad_bookmark ad WHERE ad.mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) AND ad.post_idx = pt.post_idx), 'N') AS mark_now, IFNULL((SELECT IF( NULL , '' ,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(#{url}, my_image_file))) FROM ad_mypage WHERE post_idx = pt.post_idx AND cpl_use = 'Y'), '') AS images, IF((SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) = pt.mb_idx, 'Y', 'N') AS my_post, CASE WHEN pt.post_reg_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()) >= 60 THEN CONCAT( FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()) / 60), '시간 전' ) ELSE CONCAT( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()), '분 전' ) END ELSE CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), pt.post_reg_date) = 1 THEN '어제' ELSE CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), pt.post_reg_date), '일 전') END END AS post_age FROM ad_posting pt LEFT JOIN ad_member am ON pt.mb_idx = am.mb_idx WHERE pt.post_status = 'Y' GROUP BY pt.post_idx ) AS list
ORDER BY list.post_like_cnt DESC
ORDER BY TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(list.post_reg_date, ' ', list.post_reg_time)) DESC
LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}

SELECT pt.post_idx, DATE_FORMAT(pt.post_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS post_reg_date, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(pt.post_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' ',pt.post_reg_time ) AS posting_date, pt.post_reg_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_like li WHERE li.post_idx = pt.post_idx AND li.like_type = 'P' AND like_status = 'Y') AS post_like_cnt, pt.post_title, IFNULL((SELECT IF( NULL , '' ,GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(#{url}, my_image_file))) FROM ad_mypage WHERE post_idx = pt.post_idx AND cpl_use= 'Y'), '') AS images, IFNULL((SELECT IF( NULL , '' ,GROUP_CONCAT(my_idx)) FROM ad_mypage WHERE post_idx = pt.post_idx), '') AS images_id, pt.post_content, am.mb_nickname, IFNULL((SELECT li.like_status FROM ad_like li WHERE li.mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) AND li.post_idx = pt.post_idx AND li.like_type = 'P'), 'N') AS like_status, IFNULL((SELECT mark_use FROM ad_bookmark ad WHERE ad.mb_idx = (SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) AND ad.post_idx = pt.post_idx), 'N') AS mark_now, IF((SELECT mb_idx FROM fcm_info WHERE fcm_idx = #{fcm_idx} LIMIT 1) = pt.mb_idx, 'Y', 'N') AS my_post, CASE WHEN pt.post_reg_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()) >= 60 THEN CONCAT( FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()) / 60),'시간 전' ) ELSE CONCAT( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time), NOW()), '분 전' ) END ELSE CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), pt.post_reg_date) = 1 THEN '어제' ELSE CONCAT(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), pt.post_reg_date), '일 전') END END AS post_age FROM ad_posting pt LEFT JOIN ad_member am ON pt.mb_idx = am.mb_idx WHERE pt.post_idx = #{post_idx} AND pt.post_status = 'Y' ORDER BY TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(pt.post_reg_date, ' ', pt.post_reg_time)) DESC

SELECT '[알림]' AS title , CONCAT((SELECT mb_nickname FROM ad_member WHERE mb_idx = #{mb_idx}) , '님이 [', pt.post_title, ']를' , IF(#{push_type} ='like', ' 좋아요! ', ' 북마크 '), '했습니다.') AS content , 'push' AS type , (SELECT fcm_token FROM fcm_info WHERE mb_idx = pt.mb_idx LIMIT 1) AS token , (SELECT fcm.fcm_idx FROM fcm_info fcm WHERE fcm.mb_idx = pt.mb_idx LIMIT 1) AS fcm_idx , (SELECT IFNULL(fi.push_use, 'N') FROM fcm_info fi WHERE fi.mb_idx = pt.mb_idx LIMIT 1) AS push_use FROM ad_posting pt WHERE pt.post_idx = #{post_idx}
